text: 2.17: 2 Ko 1.12; 4.2; 11.13; 1 Pi 4.11; 2 Pi 2.3Nza mba Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin shɨga mbui gumgir fara muuŋgi fhuvara. Mbe fhura tamtam ruav, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ, mbe ntan shɨga mbui. Nza Fhe Bakɨme han mba ŋaara ndigim, ana nza sarigi, nza fhura guiguigi fhuvara. Nza Krais phorgap ndava bavira kav, nza Fhe Bakɨme rɨmani nɨman, ana mba nza suaŋgi bunin vhuuiŋ, nza ntara bun nzuai.
